Configuration.Name: L1=L2=6m_central_smallap
Configuration.SetupScript:
# config.wavelength = 5 # config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 # config.det = 11200 # config.det_offset = 0 # config.srce = 180 # config.guide = 'g3' # config.apx = -98 # config.bs = 2 # config.beamcenterx = 92.03 # config.beamcenterz = 95.29
# config.drive() # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5) #sics.drive('nvs_speed', 25476) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) driveDet(5200, 0) driveEntRotAp(180) driveGuide('g6') sics.drive('apx', -23) selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 92.03) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.80)
